name: Evgueni N. Smirnov
content: E.N. Smirnov - E.N. Smirnov - Maastricht University Skip to main content E.N. Smirnov Research E.N. Smirnov I am an Assistant Professor at the Department of Advanced Computing Sciences, Maastricht University. I received MSc in Computer Science from Technical University of Sofia and PhD in Machine Learning from Maastricht University. My research interests include: Machine Learning, Data Mining, and Applications. I teach a broad range of courses in Computer Science, Programming,  Machine Learning, and Data Mining. I supervise Bachelor, Master, and PhD students. Whenever I have time I like solving real-world problems in context of commercial data science projects. Expertises Machine Learning, Reliable Prediction,Transfer Learning, Recommender Systems,   Explanation-Based Learning Career history Assistant Professor, Department of Advanced Computing Sciences, Maastricht University, Maastricht, The Netherlands.Post-Doctoral Researcher, University of Minho, Braga, Portugal.Research Assistant, AI Lab, Institute of Information Technologies, Bulgarian Academy of Sciences, Sofia, Bulgaria.Research Assistant, Institute of Informatics, Sofia, Bulgaria.Research Assistant, AI Lab, Technical University, Sofia, Bulgaria. E.N. Smirnov Assistant Professor Artificial Intelligence Dept. of Advanced Computing Sciences Faculty of Science and Engineering ORCID
